short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows archiving the contents of a tag from archiveofourown.org.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically downloads every work included in a tag, search results, or author works list in one of the supported AO3 download formats. It respects AO3's rate limits and when throttling occurs it will automatically resume once the throttling period is complete.
